name: MetaMathQA
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A dataset of approximately 395,000 mathematical problems with detailed solutions, generated through question bootstrapping from GSM8K and MATH training sets.
notes: Developed to enhance the mathematical reasoning capabilities of large language models, MetaMathQA has been utilized to fine-tune models like MetaMath-7B, which demonstrated significant performance improvements on benchmarks such as GSM8K and MATH.
